card.text: Whenever another combatant enters the battlefield, your commander gains 1 loyalty.

text.p: If Corporate Ascension has seen 20 generators enter the battlefield, you win the game.

card.name: ? Media Mogul
card.text:
As Commander -- Each player plays with the top card of their deck revealed.
As Asset -- [T]: Each player decays 1 (They each put the top card of their deck into their discard.)

card.name: Evidence Camera
card.text:
[T]: Look at the top card of any player's deck, you may put it on the bottom.
[1B], [T]: Choose a player to draw a card.
Once Evidence Camera has been exhausted five times, choose a player to gain five loyalty.

card.name: Presentation of Compromising Information
card.text:
(This effect can only be deployed if you control a renowned asset. Floating energy can't be spent to deploy renowned cards.)
Each opponent's commander loses X (X is the number of revealed cards in their hand.) loyalty.

card.name: Undermine the Competition
card.text:
Prepare 3 -- [BP] (Pay [BP] and put Undermine the Competition into your deck third from the top. When you would draw Undermine the Competition, instead deploy it without paying its cost.)
Choose a player to discard three cards.

card.name: Covert Interview
card.text:
As Covert Interview resolves you may pay [B] or [P], if you do, choose a player to decay 1 (The specified player puts the top card of their deck into their discard.)
Chose an opponent to reveal three unrevealed cards of their choice in their hand (If they have three or less unrevealed cards they reveal their hand instead) and then discard a card of your choice.

card.name: Information Sniffer
card.text:
Whenever a player draws a card, their commander loses 1 loyalty (this does not cause them to draw more cards.)
If Information Sniffer is in a vehicle, its effect is only applied to your opponents.

card.name: Expose the Corruption
card.text: Choose any number of players to decay 1 (The specified players each put the top card of their deck into their discard.)

card.name: Fireball
card.text: Choose anything for Fireball to deal X (X is the number of times cards named Fireball have previously been deployed this game.) damage to.

card.name: Soul Rip
card.text: Choose a combatant with generalized cost (The cost of the card if all typed symbols were replaced with generic numbers. E.x. Soul Rip has a generalized cost of [0].) [X] (X is the number of times cards named Soul Rip have previously been deployed this game.) or less to kill.

card.name: Scry
card.text: Draw X (X is the number of times cards named Scry have previously been deployed this game.) cards.
